items.title: RKC-back rondt fraaie transfer naar Schotland af
items.summary: We zitten in het intermezzo tussen de zomer- en winterwindow, toch druppelt er in het najaar vaak nog een aantal transfers binnen. In dit blog vind je alle speculaties en bevestigde transfers in Nederland. Bekijk hier ons blog voor de transferperikelen in het buitenland.

items.title: It‚Äôs a team game ‚Äì the beauty of a goal scored after every player has had a touch
items.summary: After Leeds‚Äô stunning move at Sunderland on Sunday, we look back at other classics from the Premier League era From Lucas Perri to Dominic Calvert-Lewin, Leeds‚Äôs equaliser at Sunderland on Sunday went from back to front. Every player in blue had a touch, playing their part in extending Leeds‚Äôs unbeaten run to five. It was the second time the whole team had been involved in a goal this season, out of 503 Premier League strikes. Here we look at some of the others. Continue reading...

items.title: Liverpool set-piece coach leaves club amid woeful record this season
items.summary: Liverpool set-piece coach Aaron Briggs has left the club midway through a season in which the Reds have the joint-worst set-play record in Europe's big five leagues.

items.title: Bondscoach Marokko uitgefloten door eigen fans: 'Zijn van nature emotioneel'
items.summary: Dat Marokko zich geplaatst heeft voor de knock-outfase van de Afrika Cup, heeft het gastland volgens Walid Regragui voor een deel aan zijn supporters te danken. De bondscoach sprak vol lof over 'de twaalfde man' door wie hij voor het duel nog werd uitgefloten. Dit naar aanleiding van het eerdere gelijkspel tegen Mali. Regragui begreep die frustratie.

items.title: From Gu√©hi to Yildiz ‚Äì who could be on the move in the January transfer window?
items.summary: We look at 10 players likely to create headlines next month, including the ‚Äònew Kevin De Bruyne‚Äô Men‚Äôs transfer interactive: January 2026 edition While Semenyo would doubtless prefer to be in Morocco at the moment, one of the advantages to Ghana‚Äôs failure to qualify for the Africa Cup of Nations has been that the 25-year-old is in the same country as all the clubs who have expressed an interest in signing him. With a contract at Bournemouth containing a ¬£65m release clause that becomes active for the first two weeks of January, Manchester City appear to have won the race for the player who has scored 19 Premier League goals since the start of last season. Chelsea and Tottenham have now moved on to other targets but could Liverpool or Manchester United attempt to steal a late march on their rivals? They need to get a move on if so. Continue reading...

items.title: Ronaldo wants 1k goals; open to Europe return
items.summary: Portugal captain Cristiano Ronaldo has reiterated his desire to reach 1,000 career goals before he calls time on his playing career.

items.title: Hakimi returns as Morocco seal AFCON knockouts
items.summary: Africa Cup of Nations hosts Morocco dispatched Zambia 3-0 at a fervid Prince Moulay Abdellah Stadium in Rabat on Monday to round off their Group A campaign in style and ease into the round of 16.

items.title: 'Als je twee omhalen maakt, dan ben je een nationale held'
items.summary: In de nieuwe VI ZSM blikken Dave Aalbers en Jarno Verweij terug op de wedstrijd van Marokko. Het gastland van het toernooi om de Afrika Cup was in de allesbeslissende wedstrijd veel te sterk voor Zambia. Hoogtepunt was een tweede rake omhaal van Ayoub El Kaabi.

items.summary: Ice skaters Jayne Torvill and Christopher Dean become a dame and knight in the New Year Honours list, while England women's manager Sarina Wiegman is made an honorary dame.

items.title: Aston Villa the thorn in Arsenal‚Äôs side that Arteta has to remove for title push
items.summary: Villa have sunk the Gunners‚Äô title hopes in recent seasons but Gabriel‚Äôs return ready for Tuesday could be crucial It may be more than six years since Unai Emery left Arsenal but it‚Äôs hard to escape the feeling that the Spaniard still has an inexorable hold over his former club. Ever since Aston Villa ended a four-match losing streak against them with a 1-0 home win in December 2023, Emery has proved to be a thorn in Mikel Arteta‚Äôs side. Villa‚Äôs 2-0 victory at the Emirates a few months later ultimately cost Arsenal the title as a relentless Manchester City took advantage by winning their last eight matches. Arsenal had an impressive 2-0 triumph in Birmingham at the start of last season, but Villa‚Äôs comeback from two goals down to draw 2-2 in January of this year was symptomatic of Arsenal‚Äôs failure to chase down Liverpool in the title race that never was. Continue reading...
